## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fff73c6bf9aca315c6862ecd687f86ec42323c9157188d9b0ba10313c82e531b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'bytedplus-rec' @ 99.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
